::FLAC__StreamDecoder * decoder_

Detailed Description

This class wraps the FLAC__StreamDecoder.

Member Function Documentation

State FLAC::Decoder::Stream::init (    ) 
 

Initialize the instance; as with the C interface, init() should be called after construction and 'set' calls but before any of the 'process' calls.
